Downshift Labs

I'm Denis and together with a few others I can make things for the web that will help your business.

I am seriously into all things with motors. Specifically, I love to autocross my Miata roadster and disturb the peace on my supermotard. Spot them in the background along with other various vehicles from my past.

I am formally a computer scientist according to the Univeristy of Connecticut, but really I am just thrilled to be creating for the web.
